##This project will create a scatterplot showing the correlation between the height and girth of the data in trees dataset.

#First, load ggplot2

``` {r}
library(ggplot2)
```

#Then, load trees package and show the head of data

```{r}
bd <- datasets::trees
head(bd, 5)
```

#And create the scatterplot

```{r}
ggplot(bd, aes(x = Girth, y = Height))+
        geom_point(aes(col = Volume, size = Volume)) +
        xlim(c(7, 25)) +
        ylim(c(60, 90))
```
